prompt: Create a luxurious shopping cart page with a dark purple background and gold accents. Display cart items in a vertical list of ornate cards with gold borders, each showing a product icon centered at the top, product name, price, and quantity controls with plus/minus buttons in a horizontal row. Place the summary section (subtotal, tax, total) in a gold-bordered container at the bottom. Use a gold checkout button with rounded corners. Ensure elegant typography and generous padding, using a Column layout.
